{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=NBG6817 |revision=(Armor Z2) |asin=B01I4223HS;US; |series=AC2600 |est_release_date=06/28/2016 |fcc_date=09/14/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=I88NBG6817 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Kingston |fla1_model=S10004 |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25U3235F |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W632GU6KB-12 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0,USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC2600 MU-MIMO Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router}} :''Armor Z2 Router for Gaming and Media with StreamBoost '' :[http://www.zyxel.com/us/en/products_services/armor_z2.shtml?t=p Product page]
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/nbg6817 ''ZyXEL NBG6817'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6817 HW Data])
{{see also|ZyXEL NBG6816 (Armor Z1)}}
===Specifications=== *Powerful 1.7GHz dual-core processor boosts performance *Memory: 4GB eMMC flash and 512MB DDR3 RAM *2nd Generation AC2600 Chipset for 2600Mbps speed 802.11ac *Get ultimate Wi-Fi speeds-up to 2.53Gbps (800+1733 Mbps) *Quad-Stream technology delivers Wi-Fi to multiple devices simultaneously *Streamboost optimization to deliver the gaming and streaming experience *Next generation Wave2 Wi-Fi - 160MHz, MU-MIMO, Quad-stream *4x4 MU-MIMO technology that enables accelerated transmission :to wireless devices for even faster Wi-Fi speeds *Four high-performance external antennas deliver maximum range *Beamforming antennas for enhanced wireless coverage and stability *Twin USB ports offer high-speed, USB storage-ready access *Dynamic QoS prioritizes network traffic by application and device *Easy setup wtih eaZy 123 and user freindly usage monitoring
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/zyxel-armor-z2-ac2600-mu-mimo-dual-band-gigabit-router.33345/ ''ZyXEL Armor Z2'' on '''SNB''' forums] :*It will offer up to 2600Mbps of combined wireless speeds with ::the [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 1.7GHz dual-core processor at its’ heart :*It comes with 512MB of RAM, and 4GB eMMC Flash Storage for router ::applications such as the included Qualcomm Streamboost technology :*Four fine-tuned dual-band external antennas offering 500m2 coverage :*802.11ac Wave2 MU-MIMO and support for 160MHz channel bandwidth :*MyZyXEL Cloud with 2 USB ports (1x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0): CrystalDiskMark ::testing showed read speeds reached 94Mb/s and write speeds of 50Mb/s :*ZyXEL’s eaZy123 setup, ZyXEL One Connect App support, and ZyXEL Photo *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60385:1756#1756 ''ZyXEL Armor Z2'' on '''iXBT''' forums] :[http://www.zyxel.com/us/en/products_services/armor_z2.shtml?t=p '''Armor Z2'''] ''AC2600 MU-MIMO Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router'' :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 @1.7GHz dual core :*Memory: 512MB RAM and 4GB eMMC flash :*Wireless Standard: ::802.11b/g/n (2.4GHz), 802.11a/n/ac (5GHz) :*Wireless Speed: Transmit/Receive ::800Mbps for 2.4GHz ::1733Mbps for 5GHz :*Antenna: 4x dual-band high performance :*USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0
===See also=== *[[ZyXEL NBG6816]] (''Armor Z1'') - AC2350 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router {{•}} [http://www.zyxel.com/us/en/products_services/armor_z1.shtml?t=p PPage]
